About Us

Ryan Kaminski

Founder - CEO - Data Scientist

Ryan Kaminski is the Founder and CEO of FreeMarketInsights. Ryan earned his Bachelors in Finance at Tulane University before moving to Oregon to pursue a career in Finance. After school, Ryan self trained in Data Science and began applying his Financial prowess to programming by developing the FreeMarketInsights data analytics algorithms. In his free time, he enjoys coding and spending time with friends and family.

Marius Morar

Web Developer

Marius finished the computer science faculty in Bucharest, he is passionate about web technologies, working with the latest technologies in different fields. In his spare time he likes to read blogs, cook, travel, and explore the world.

Luoyang Su

Graphic Design Engineer

Rabia Nadeem

Social Media Manager

Rabia manages the FreeMarketInsights social media presence. Rabia earned a Masters in Accounting and Finance from the University of Central Punjab and now lives in Sialkot Pakistan. Rabia spent time as an assistant accountant for six months before deciding to earn an additional professional diploma in digital marget, SEO, and blogging. To combine her passion for Finance and goals for growing as a digital marketer, Rabia took on the position as Social Media Manager at FMI . Rabia is also passionate about politics, sports and loves reading novels.
